Name: Average time from SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Total time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to occur after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and ending with SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-EIC Reject in rejected submissions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment when the subsequent path leads to SW-Reviewer Agreed versus when it leads to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex review paths involving multiple revision rounds
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the final decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision) in each variant
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Total time spent in SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all variants where it is immediately followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that eventually reach SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to those that end in rejection without reviewer agreement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to the first reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1) in cases requiring reviewer follow-up
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
